rules_text: Whenever Voracious Spawn enters or attacks, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. If you exile a permanent card, put a +1/+1 counter on Voracious Spawn. If you exile a nonpermanent card, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text2: [i]“The plants within these woods shows signs of harvest, yet none are fit for human consumption. This begs the question; what are they fit for?”[/i]
